ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.description: A tree-sitter parser for YAML files.

name: tree-sitter-yaml

about.description: A tree-sitter parser for YAML files.
A tree-sitter parser for YAML files.

raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  name: tree-sitter-yaml
  version: "0.7.2"

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/tree-sitter-grammars/tree-sitter-yaml/archive/refs/tags/v${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: aeaff5731bb8b66c7054c8aed33cd5edea5f4cd2ac71654f3f6c2ba2073d8fac

build:
  script:
    - ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed --no-build-isolation -vv
  number: 1


requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ compiler("c") }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - if: target_platform != build_platform
      then:
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - python
  host:
    - pip
    - python
    - setuptools >=42
  run:
    - python

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - tree_sitter_yaml
      pip_check: true
  - script:
      - python -m pytest bindings/python/tests/
    requirements:
      run:
        - pytest
        - python
        - tree_sitter >=0.22
    files:
      source:
        - bindings/python/tests/

about:
  homepage: https://github.com/tree-sitter-grammars/tree-sitter-yaml
  summary: 'YAML grammar for tree-sitter.'
  description: |
    A tree-sitter parser for YAML files.
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  repository: https://github.com/tree-sitter-grammars/tree-sitter-yaml

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - MementoRC

about.description: A tree-sitter parser for YAML files.
